entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
